top_n.name: Top N Records
top_n.description: Get top N records sorted by a column
top_n.template: Show me the top {n} {table} records sorted by {column} {order}
top_n.example: Show me the top 10 shipment records sorted by date descending

date_range.name: Date Range Analysis
date_range.example: Show me shipment records from 2026-01-01 to 2026-01-31

aggregation.name: Group By Aggregation
aggregation.template: Show me the {aggregation} of {column} grouped by {group_column} for {table}
aggregation.example: Show me the sum of weight grouped by client for shipments

join_tables.name: Join Multiple Tables
join_tables.template: Show me data from {table1} joined with {table2} on {join_column}
join_tables.example: Show me data from shipments joined with clients on client_id

trend_analysis.name: Trend Over Time
trend_analysis.template: Show me the trend of {metric} over {time_period} for {table}
trend_analysis.example: Show me the trend of shipment count over months for shipments

distinct_values.name: Distinct Values
distinct_values.description: Get unique values from a column
distinct_values.template: Show me all distinct {column} values from {table}
distinct_values.example: Show me all distinct status values from shipments

recent_records.name: Recent Records
recent_records.template: Show me the most recent {n} {table} records
recent_records.example: Show me the most recent 20 shipment records
